EmailTemplate.subject: Every Big Data Journey Needs a Little Navigation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline Big data assets are about delivering business results. What can you do to ensure your big data projects are living up to their promise?
Learn about data lake architectures, trends in the Internet of Things, how to leverage open source technologies and more in Pivotal’s Big Data Blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=bigdata-targetaccount-nurture-q22015>, which highlights news, technology and market perspectives.
If you would like to learn more about Pivotal’s big data solutions, please explore the Pivotal Big Data Suite <https://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=bigdata-targetaccount-nurture-q22015> overview.
If you are considering testing the waters of a data lake, this animated infographic <http://pivotal.io/big-data/infographic/build-your-business-data-lake?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=bigdata-targetaccount-nurture-q22015> is a good place to start.
The Pivotal Team
